page.title: 12DAY OF A CHILD AGE 9 ALSAGER
page.content: Monday July 8th started like any other day, I get out of bed, go to the bathroom ,have a drink, then go down stairs. "Hello," says Mum, "hurry up with breakfast." Mum's always up before me,her hobby is knitting. David comes down with Dad; my Dad's hobby is messing with the car. David likes snooker. The cat rubs round my legs, his hobby seems to be bird catching. I set off for school. I play out as soon as I get there. The whistle goes at 9.00 a.m. Oh no its maths. The type of sums we do are like this: Â£7.54 or 15 or 65/7 or 698 +Â£5.26 x14 _284 ______ ___ ____ English is better than maths. We go and play at 10.30 a.m. Eat at noon and play at 2.30p.m. My hobbies are collecting ornaments and playing tennis. By Sarah White.
